Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Punchline: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. Support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Changelog: See the Sonar Support discord #announcements channel for more information

supportInfo.supportText: Support is provided exclusively at the Sonar Support discord. You can also create a ticket if privacy is desired. To send feedback please do so via /sonarsupport or join the Discord.

AcceptsFeedbackComment: To send feedback, type /sonarsupport to send feedback or let us know in the Sonar Support discord
